DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_GP_VENDAS_MES
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT B.NOME,SUM(A.VALOR) TOTAL
FROM K_CRM_METASVENDAS A
JOIN Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS B ON A.USUARIO = B.HANDLE
WHERE MONTH(A.DATA) = MONTH(GETDATE())
GROUP BY B.NOME
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <DecimalField Alias="TOTAL" From="A" Path="TOTAL" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
